iterateOverAllPublicAggregationsOfRootCo.description: Iterates over all controls beginning with the root control of the wysiwyg canvas (e.g. UIArea/View) and calling the callback function for each of them.

selectUI5Control.description: Selects a given UI5 control inside the wysiwyg canvas

deselectUI5Control.description: Deselects a selected UI5 control inside the wysiwyg canvas

highlightUI5Control.description: Hightlights a given UI5 control inside the wysiwyg canvas

downplayUI5Control.description: Downplays a given UI5 control inside the wysiwyg canvas

deleteUI5Control.description: Deletes a given UI5 control inside the wysiwyg canvas

deleteUI5ControlWithValidations.description: calls the deleteUI5Control after checking and raising confirmation dialog

navigateUI5Control.description: navigate among UI5 controls inside the wysiwyg canvas

goToCode.description: Go to XML representation of the UI5 control currently selected

openInLayoutEditor.description: open fragment or sub view in layout editor from the selected control in the view

pasteSibling.description: Paste a control as sibling of selection

hasClipboard.description: is there a copied control in the clipboard

getScope.description: return the wysiwyg canvas window scope (iframes contentWindow)

bindingChanged.description: Will be fired on data binding changes.

viewHasChanged.description: Will be fired on any change in WYSIWYG area.

viewElementSelected.description: Will be fired on selection of control or aggregation in the layout editor
